StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTechTree_Name
StringTable.String: Drengin Tech Tree

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTechTree_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A tech tree with military and production specialization.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTechTree_Dec
StringTable.String: A tech tree with military and production specialization.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginImperialismTech_Name
StringTable.String: Imperialism

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginImperialismTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Colonizing new worlds is cheaper than invading them, if not as fun.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginImperialismTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The stench of slaveling flesh is becoming overwhelming. We must begin moving some of the smelliest to new worlds.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginXenoExpoltation_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Exploitation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginXenoExpoltation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Put all those worthless colonists to work doing something useful.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginXenoExpoltation_Dec
StringTable.String: Colonization is not a vacation! Who told the slavelings that? These lazy curs need something to do and a place to do it.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIndustrialSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Labor Exploitation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIndustrialSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIndustrialSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The trick to making the slavelings work harder wasn't bigger whips, surprisingly, but smaller, more painful whips.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIndustrialSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Mental Exploitation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIndustrialSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves research capacity.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIndustrialSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Whips don't make slavelings more creative which is problematic, because we have a lot of whips. It turns out that death threats work good though.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIndustrialSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Industrial Exploitation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIndustrialSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of manufacturing and research centers.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIndustrialSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Slavelings too weak to work or dumb to research have mostly been used for target practice and ballast. But it turns out we can also use them for simple maintenance tasks, which should make things cheaper to run.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSlaveryTech_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Slavery

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSlaveryTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces the whelps into constructing more advanced facilities.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSlaveryTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Keeping the slavelings alive and healthy on these awful alien planets seems like a pointless task. But it's not! Because we need the slaves to make things, we must kill them for aesthetic reasons only.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginConstructionOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Optimized Chain Gangs

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginConstructionOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginConstructionOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: By turning the slavelings against each other, competing for food or nicer whips, we can increase their work rate and our manufacturing capacity.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginConstructionOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Slave Longevity

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginConstructionOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces manufacturing cost.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginConstructionOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Modified whipping techniques - we stopped aiming at the head, basically - have dramatically improved slaveling survivability and reduced our manufacturing costs.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginConstructionOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Selective Slave Retention

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginConstructionOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of manufacturing plants.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginConstructionOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our oldest and most experienced slavelings aren't just good at not dying. They're good at knowing how work is done. By not working them to death, as backwards as that seems, we make all our operations more efficient.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMechanizedSlaveryTech_Name
StringTable.String: Mechanized Slavery

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMechanizedSlaveryTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: With the right tools, our slavelings can build even more.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMechanizedSlaveryTech_Dec
StringTable.String: By giving our slavelings powerful and dangerous tools, we can manufacture goods and chew up slaves at greater rates than ever before.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginManufacturingFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Military Industry

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginManufacturingFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Encourage our slaves to have an interest in guns.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginManufacturingFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of our weirder slavelings have a natural inclination to working on weapon systems. By finding these strange loners and whipping them in the right direction, we can improve our weapons manufacturing ability.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginManufacturingFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Social Industry

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginManufacturingFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Thin out our weakest slaves.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginManufacturingFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: By continually putting the weakest and ugliest slavelings in the most dangerous roles, we can thin out their numbers, resulting in a slave population that is much better looking and effective at manufacturing.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginManufacturingFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Competitive Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginManufacturingFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Slaves that eat less and last longer

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginManufacturingFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By selectively whipping every slaveling who asked for food we eventually encouraged everyone to stop asking, resulting in cheaper manufacturing centers.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSlaveMastersTech_Name
StringTable.String: Slave Masters

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSlaveMastersTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Mastery of slave manufacturing techniques.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSlaveMastersTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our manufacturing capacity has reached its absolute peak. We're squeezing the most out of our slavelings, occasionally literally.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSlavePits_Name
StringTable.String: Slave Pits

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSlavePits_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes more slaves available.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSlavePits_Dec
StringTable.String: Both our manufacturing and research facilities have been going through slavelings at an alarming rate. They require us to build slave pits to make more slavelings for shoveling into the fires of progress.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSlaveMills_Name
StringTable.String: Slave Mills

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSlaveMills_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The only thing better than cheap slaves are really cheap slaves.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSlaveMills_Dec
StringTable.String: The nice thing about pits are that they're miserable and decrepit. But they're very space inefficient. By making slave mills we can make more slavelings than ever. We'll just have to make sure the mills are still really miserable and decrepit.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArtificialSlaves_Name
StringTable.String: Artificial Slaves

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArtificialSlaves_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Cloning slaves is much faster than waiting for them to grow up.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArtificialSlaves_Dec
StringTable.String: Artificial slavelings take most of the fun out of manufacturing - they just don't beg for their lives and freedom as much. But boy can we sure churn them out in a hurry.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPersuasiveResearch_Name
StringTable.String: Persuasive Research

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPersuasiveResearch_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force our smartest slaves to be smarter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPersuasiveResearch_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of our slavelings, with gentle encouragement, can be made into excellent researchers. We theorize they will become smarter still with harsh whipping.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginResearchOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Creative Motivation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginResearchOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves research with the use of creative motivation techniques.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginResearchOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our smartest slavelings don't seem to like pain, and we've found a great way to put that to use!

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginResearchOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Creative Living

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginResearchOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Pack more research slaves into the same amount of space.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginResearchOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: It turns out that when we pack our researchers' kennels closer together, they're better able to share ideas.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginResearchOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Creative Resources

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginResearchOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Who needs test subjects when you have researchers.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginResearchOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By making our least effective research slavelings into test subjects, we encourage better research and also save an awful lot of money on test subjects.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginResearchExtraction_Name
StringTable.String: Research Extraction

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginResearchExtraction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Extract ideas from their smart little brains.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginResearchExtraction_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of our research slavelings have been holding out on us! They save their smartest thoughts for plans of escape and eating! So we have found a way to just suck the ideas from their brains. Sometimes they even survive the experience.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTechnologicalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Focused Research

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTechnologicalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Research capacity.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTechnologicalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing our efforts on pure research we have been able to get a significant improvement on the rate of new discoveries.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTechnologicalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Research Production Focus

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTechnologicalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Cost of Research improvements.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTechnologicalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing our efforts on our research infrastructure we have been able to cut down the cost of building new facilities.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTechnologicalFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Research Economics

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTechnologicalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces Maintenance of Research improvements.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTechnologicalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By focusing how our researchers work and eliminating some of the more wasteful experiments, we have been able to significantly reduce the maintenance of our research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIntelligenceAmplification_Name
StringTable.String: Intelligence Amplification

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIntelligenceAmplification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boosts the intelligence of slaves.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIntelligenceAmplification_Dec
StringTable.String: Applying powerful electrical currents to a slaveling's head was at first just a fun hobby. But by doing it in a very specific way, it can apparently make our slavelings far more intelligent. It still thankfully causes a great deal of pain.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDeeperKnowledge_Name
StringTable.String: Mysterious Knowledge

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDeeperKnowledge_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of reduced torture research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDeeperKnowledge_Dec
StringTable.String: Our wisest and weakest slavelings predict that we will be able to research even faster if we torture them less. This is a dangerous idea which we will pursue very carefully.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginQuantumUnderstanding_Name
StringTable.String: Pain-Free Understanding

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginQuantumUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of torture-free research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginQuantumUnderstanding_Dec
StringTable.String: Our untortured research slavelings have made remarkable progress unlocking the mysteries of the universe. Were we wrong to torture them for so long?

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeyondMortality_Name
StringTable.String: Beyond Mortality

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeyondMortality_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of ultra-torture research facilities. Prepares civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeyondMortality_Dec
StringTable.String: We were wrong to stop torturing the slavelings! We tried torturing them even harder and look what they came up with! Ascension will allow us new dimensions to spread misery!

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginResearchCoordination_Name
StringTable.String: Slave Coordination

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginResearchCoordination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Letting the slaves talk is dangerous but necessary.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginResearchCoordination_Dec
StringTable.String: We don't like when slavelings talk to each other. This is the cause of much whipping. But for the research slaves, sometimes they research better when they talk. This is problematic, but we will let more talking happen for now.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginNeroLinking_Name
StringTable.String: Neuro Linking

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginNeroLinking_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Link slave brains together.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginNeroLinking_Dec
StringTable.String: By linking slaveling's brains together in a virtual research matrix, they can research even better. We have to create new virtual whips, but that is its own type of fun.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPlanetaryImprovement_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Exploitation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPlanetaryImprovement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: We must whip these new planets into shape.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPlanetaryImprovement_Dec
StringTable.String: Many of the new planets we visit and conquer are garbage planets filled with poison. Soon though, we will beat them into submission.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPlanetarySpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Soil Enhancement

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPlanetarySpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force planets to make more food.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPlanetarySpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: By shouting at the soil and threatening it with beatings and harsh fertilizers, we can improve plant crop production. Plant crops are horrible tasting, but they keep the slavelings alive at least.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPlanetarySpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Accelerated Growth

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPlanetarySpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force planets to make more slavelings.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPlanetarySpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: By making simple adjustments to the size and shape of our slave pits, we can encourage the slavelings to make new slavelings faster.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPlanetarySpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Enhanced Production

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPlanetarySpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force planets to be more productive.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPlanetarySpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By installing structures across the landscape that display motivational messages in towering pillars of fire, we can motivate our slavelings to work harder. And certainly hotter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginXenoAgriculturalAdaptation_Name
StringTable.String: Agricultural Adaptation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginXenoAgriculturalAdaptation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adapt our livestock to alien environments.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginXenoAgriculturalAdaptation_Dec
StringTable.String: Unfortunately, slavelings can't just eat other slavelings - the math just doesn't work. Also, slave meat is too valuable to waste. We need other meat crops to round out our diet, and making the meat crops grow on garbage alien worlds has been tough.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAgriculturalOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Accelerated Agriculture

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAgriculturalOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Make our meat crops meatier.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAgriculturalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our meat crops need to eat more plant crops to become meatier. But they often refuse. So now we're making them eat more.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAgriculturalOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Efficient Agriculture

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAgriculturalOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Make our meat farms more efficient.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAgriculturalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our meat crops are picky eaters, and don't like eating alien plants. But there are so many alien plants! So we started forcing the meat crops to eat them.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAgriculturalOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Sustainable Agriculture

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAgriculturalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance cost of meat farms.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAgriculturalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Meat crops like lots of space to roam around and eat plant crops. But space is expensive. So we put the meat crops in cages and give them a larger cage where they can take turns roaming.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIntensiveFarming_Name
StringTable.String: Intensive Farming

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIntensiveFarming_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of high density meat farms.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIntensiveFarming_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we know we can stack our meat crops in crates and replace their roaming with electrical shocks, we can dramatically increase our meat crop production.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginFarmingFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Nutritional Focus

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginFarmingFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Make our meat crops even meatier.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginFarmingFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Letting meat crops get meatier on their own is a slow business. By injecting nutrients directly into the meat crop's neck, they get meatier much faster.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginFarmingFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Farm Adaptability Focus

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginFarmingFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Make meat farms even more efficient.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginFarmingFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our research slavelings have found a way to make meat crops more cube shaped, which lets us stack them quite a bit easier.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginFarmingFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Farm Management Focus

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginFarmingFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance cost of meat farms even more.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginFarmingFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of the farm slavelings have found that by being nicer to the meat crops, they stop screaming as much, making their work easier. This is a troubling concept, so we have instead given everyone earplugs instead.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLosslessFarming_Name
StringTable.String: Meat Trees

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLosslessFarming_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic meat farms.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLosslessFarming_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to grow meat crops suspended on lattice-like trees, completely removing the need for grazing room. Food production is at an all time high! As is the screaming.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAgriculturalMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Farmers

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAgriculturalMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Maximizes meat crop yield

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAgriculturalMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our meat crops are now a cruel mockery of nature, yielding more meat than sanity should allow. Visitors from other worlds vomit at the sight of how efficient our farms are.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAgriculturalMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Arousing Farming

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAgriculturalMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Meat farms increase population growth

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAgriculturalMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our meat farms are now so cruelly efficient that the mere sight of them is incredibly arousing to most Drengin. Less so to the slavelings, but they're getting used to it. Regular tours of the farms have yielded incredible bonuses to population growth.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSlaveringRecycling_Name
StringTable.String: Slaveling Recycling

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSlaveringRecycling_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Recycled Slaves

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSlaveringRecycling_Dec
StringTable.String: Slave meat is a delicacy, and we're certainly not going to start sharing it with them. But the parts of the slaveling that we don't use can be turned into a nutritious and flavorful paste they can add to their own meals.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginProteinResequencing_Name
StringTable.String: Protein Resequencing

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginProteinResequencing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of Protein sequencing farms.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginProteinResequencing_Dec
StringTable.String: Our research slavelings have found a way to create meat without using a meat crop. Resequencing raw biomass can create massive quantities of food with no screaming at all. We forced them to make the food scream a little to at least make it palatable.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginXenoBiology_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Biology

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginXenoBiology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved medical facilities. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginXenoBiology_Dec
StringTable.String: Understanding how alien bacteria and viruses affect Altaria-based life will be crucial if we hope to ensure our colonists' safety.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPopulationEnhancement_Name
StringTable.String: Bio Enhancement

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPopulationEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces the population to be stronger and live longer.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPopulationEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: With medical technology we can make our slavelings live longer. That sounds bad, but it means we can hurt them more, which is good. And they will make more stuff, which is better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBioReplication_Name
StringTable.String: Bio Replication

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBioReplication_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Begin cloning useful slavelings.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBioReplication_Dec
StringTable.String: We can now clone slavelings, which means we can make more slavelings faster than ever. Also, it is an easy matter to clone only our strongest and most docile slavelings. The whipping will be less necessary, though we can still do it for fun.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEnvironmentalEngineering_Name
StringTable.String: Environmental Engineering

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEnvironmentalEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Beat the planet into submission.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEnvironmentalEngineering_Dec
StringTable.String: Ground is meant for building things on, and if it can't be built on, then that ground is insolent and needs to be beaten into submission with science. Know your place, dirt.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginExtremeWorldColonization_Name
StringTable.String: Extreme Colonization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginExtremeWorldColonization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force the slavelings to settle on extreme worlds.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginExtremeWorldColonization_Dec
StringTable.String: We now have the technology to allow slavelings to survive on extreme world. Just survive though; the slavelings won't enjoy it. But that's at least half the appeal.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginColonizationFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Aquatic World Mastery

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginColonizationFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Aquatic Worlds, and boost their wealth and Tourism.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginColonizationFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our experience forcing the slavelings to breathe water has resulted in many dead slavelings, but finally, with the help of some aggressive surgery, a few got the hang of it.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginColonizationFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Frozen World Mastery

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginColonizationFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Frozen Worlds, and boost their Research and Influence.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginColonizationFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: It was only a matter of time before our slavelings adapted thick enough skin to thrive on these frozen worlds. Many have also taken to wearing extra layers of skin culled from fallen slavelings.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginColonizationFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Barren World Mastery

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginColonizationFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Barren Worlds, and boost their Manufacturing and Military.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginColonizationFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: We went through a lot of slavelings trying to make one that didn't need water. We didn't quite get there, but they now use so little that it makes no difference. They are quite dry to the touch however.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAtmosphericCleansing_Name
StringTable.String: Atmospheric Cleansing

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAtmosphericCleansing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force the slavelings to live and die on radioactive and toxic worlds. Mostly die.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAtmosphericCleansing_Dec
StringTable.String: Our research slavelings, the treacherous weaklings, have made it possible for other slavelings to live on radioactive and toxic worlds. The research slavelings will not be popular after this.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBiospherePerfection1_Name
StringTable.String: Radioactive World Mastery

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBiospherePerfection1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Radioactive Worlds, and boost their Manufacturing output.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBiospherePerfection1_Dec
StringTable.String: After much suffering and the removal of extra limbs, we now have the technology to protect our slavelings from the harsh environment of radioactive worlds. Any extra limbs will only be kept if they prove useful.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBiospherePerfection2_Name
StringTable.String: Toxic World Mastery

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBiospherePerfection2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Toxic Worlds, and boost their Research output.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBiospherePerfection2_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to advances in sealant and filters, our slavelings are dying at a slower rate than ever on toxic worlds. They still die a little though, so don't worry.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTerraformingTech_Name
StringTable.String: Terraforming

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTerraformingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Make awful planets less awful.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTerraformingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Planets are easy to conquer but very stubborn once you conquer them because they are dumb and feel no pain. Fortunately our research slavelings are making great advances in making planets feel pain.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHabitatImprovement_Name
StringTable.String: Habitat Improvement

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHabitatImprovement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Batter even the unruliest land into shape.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHabitatImprovement_Dec
StringTable.String: Using the power of massive explosions and unbridled hatred, we're able to force even more land to submit to our will.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSoilReclamation_Name
StringTable.String: Soil Reclamation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSoilReclamation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Create useful soil from almost nothing.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSoilReclamation_Dec
StringTable.String: We can now force just about any useless part of a planet to be less useless. If it's solid enough to crash a ship into, we can probably do something with it.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEnvironmentalResequencing_Name
StringTable.String: Environmental Resequencing

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEnvironmentalResequencing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Let's use continents that don't even exist yet.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEnvironmentalResequencing_Dec
StringTable.String: Many of the planets we find have continents put in very inconvenient places, because nature is stupid. Finally we have the technology to fix its mistakes.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEngineeringTech_Name
StringTable.String: Engineering

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEngineeringTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: We can now make hyperdrives and tiny hulls.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEngineeringTech_Dec
StringTable.String: With this Terran hyperdrive invention, we can bend space around our ships and accelerate them at incredible speeds. Conquering the stars just got a lot easier. Bad move Terrans.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarTravel_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Travel

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarTravel_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Gives weaklings more air, as well as better sensors and hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarTravel_Dec
StringTable.String: Our starship captains complain that their ships aren't good enough to see anything, and that everyone is dying because there is not enough air. These weak and breathless captains may have a point.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperdrive Specialization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be faster.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The Terrans are clever, but not so clever. There are many possible improvements to be made to this hyperdrive, to make it more useful for hunting them down.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Transportation Specialization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Mass of Colony & Constuctor modules.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Pushing large Support Modules through space is inherently wasteful, by miniaturizing and optimizing the larger components, we can fit more on a ship, allowing them to go farther and faster than ever.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Recirculation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to travel further.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: It's always about air and food with these mewling space travelers. Always they need more of it. We shall teach them how to get by with less.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIonDriveTech_Name
StringTable.String: Ion Drive

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIonDriveTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Now we can make hyperdrives that eat more.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIonDriveTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our research slavelings have found that by cramming ions captured during flight into our engines, our hyperdrives will move faster. They call them Ion Drives, and promise they will get us to the places we need to sunder much more quickly.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIonOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: High Output Drives

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIonOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be faster.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIonOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Making our engines eat more ions is fussy work. The engines sometimes vomit it seems. Our engineers are starting to get the hang of it though.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIonOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Drive Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIonOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our drives to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIonOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: The slavelings who make our hyperdrives have gotten so good at it that the drives now cost us less. We shall reward the slavelings with more work.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIonOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Drive Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIonOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our drives to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIonOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Lighter hyperdrives used to mean that the slavelings didn't put in all the parts. But now it means that they have put in all the parts, but have just done a really good job.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarpFieldTheory_Name
StringTable.String: Warp Field Theory

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarpFieldTheory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Now we can stack hyperfields on top of each other.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarpFieldTheory_Dec
StringTable.String: Our research slavelings have invented a new hyperdrive that stacks speediness in a better way than before. They used longer words than that, but basically these new engines make our ships go faster.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarpFieldFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Warp Field Focus

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarpFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to go faster.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarpFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings found a way to stack hyperfields in a better way. More stackier? Anyways, this makes the ships faster.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarpFieldFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Field Generator Focus

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarpFieldFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our drives to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarpFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The construction slavelings have found that they can use less bolts to strap in our new Warp Fields and that no-one seems to notice. Well done, construction slavelings.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarpFieldFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Field Generator Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarpFieldFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our drives to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarpFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: After many beatings the manufacturing slavelings admitted that they messed up, and were making our warp drives too fat. They have fixed their mistake, but oh, the beatings will not stop for some time yet.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHyperwarpWaves_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperwarp Waves

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHyperwarpWaves_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Now we can make hyperdrives more hyper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHyperwarpWaves_Dec
StringTable.String: What is a "cascading warp field?" The research slavelings tell us it squishes space that is already squished, and you have no idea how much we had to beat them to get an answer that simple. Bottom line: they make our ships go more.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHyperwarpMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Drive Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHyperwarpMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our drives to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHyperwarpMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that our drives are so advanced, whipping the slavelings harder does not make them cost less, because it makes the slaves drop expensive parts. Instead we need to whip their families more.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHyperwarpMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Drive Mass Reduction

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHyperwarpMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our drives to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHyperwarpMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: There were a lot of safety features in our drive systems that were adding unnecessary weight. That's been taken care of now, and all rejoice.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginStellarFoldingTech_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Folding

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginStellarFoldingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build the ultimate hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginStellarFoldingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Stellar Folding drives squish space like space has never been squished before. Our ships now arrive at their domination destinations faster than ever before.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHyperfieldProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperfield Projection

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHyperfieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces friendly ships to be faster.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHyperfieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings report that we can now squish space for other ships nearby ours. Entire fleets can be made to go faster. The research slavelings have outdone themselves this time.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGravityFieldManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Gravity Field Manipulation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGravityFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be more maneuverable.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGravityFieldManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings claim we can now generate artificial gravity fields that will make our ships faster and more maneuverable in combat.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHyperfieldDisruption_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperfield Disruption

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHyperfieldDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces enemy ships to be slower.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHyperfieldDisruption_Dec
StringTable.String: Our hyperfield generators are now capable of interfering with enemy ships, reducing their speed as they approach our starbases. Anyone foolish enough to attack us will have extra time to reconsider.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginStellarFieldProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Field Projection

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginStellarFieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces friendly ships to be even more faster.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginStellarFieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: We can now apply our most powerful hyperfields to friendly ships, forcing even the most primitive of them to travel at great speeds. Buckle up you lazy curs.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarSurvey_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Survey

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarSurvey_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Now we can make better tools for looking at planets.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarSurvey_Dec
StringTable.String: If we want to conquer the planets - and we do, very much so - it may be useful to know where they are.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSensorOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Amplification

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSensorOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to see further.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSensorOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings tried using a faster computer with the sensors, and report that it makes them work better. Seems kind of obvious. We'll keep an eye on those slavelings.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSensorOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Sensors Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSensorOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSensorOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we picked out all the slavelings with crafty little fingers to make our sensor systems, we should expect to see them made for much cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSensorOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSensorOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSensorOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Apparently our first generation of sensor systems used a lot of lead and rock in them. That's gone now, but we think the research slavelings were playing a prank on us.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEnergyFieldSensors_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Field Sensors

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEnergyFieldSensors_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Our looking tools have gotten more advanced again!

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEnergyFieldSensors_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that the research slavelings have been forced to study space folding for several years, they realize that they can build sensors capable of detecting enemy ships at much greater distances than previously believed.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEnergyFieldFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Field Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEnergyFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to see further.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEnergyFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our naval officers report that there were several basic mistakes in our latest sensors. We've fixed those, and extended our sensor range. We're still deciding what to do with the research slavelings. Some kind of shame-based clothing, perhaps.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEnergyFieldFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Efficacy Focus

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEnergyFieldFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEnergyFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The slavelings responsible for making sensors have found a way to make them cheaper. It is cute the way they try to please us.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEnergyFieldFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Sensors

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEnergyFieldFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEnergyFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered that the research slavelings have been purposefully making our sensors inefficient, so that they can later make the sensors lighter and themselves look good. This is clever, and shall be rewarded with a clever punishment.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSubspaceSensors_Name
StringTable.String: Subspace Sensors

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSubspaceSensors_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Our looking tools are now very good looking.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSubspaceSensors_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings say that we can now see in subspace, which is a place that exists, but not very well. This will let our ships now see things they mean to shoot from much further away.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSensorMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Simplification

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSensorMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSensorMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: The sensor making slavelings have found even more cost savings we can make in the construction of our sensors. They are adorable, these sensor making slavelings, and are becoming our empire's favorite pets.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSensorMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Sensor Mass Reduction

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSensorMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our sensors to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSensorMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: "MAKE THE SENSORS LIGHTER, YOU SCUM!" we shouted. "DO IT NOW!" we added. And you know, it worked? Sometimes you don't need to over think these things.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTargetingAssistTech_Name
StringTable.String: Targeting Assist

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTargetingAssistTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build targeting and stealth modules.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTargetingAssistTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ships were not slaughtering as much as they should have, so we made them enhanced targeting systems. At the same time they were being slaughtered more than they should have, so we made them a system which confuses enemy sensors.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTargetingSupport_Name
StringTable.String: Targeting Support

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTargetingSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build fleet-wide targeting and jamming modules.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTargetingSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: The sensor systems we designed for making our ships slaughter better (and stop being slaughtered) can now benefit an entire fleet of vessels.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginXenoArcheology_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Archeology

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginXenoArcheology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor research to be better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginXenoArcheology_Dec
StringTable.String: A powerful race called the Precursors once called this space home. We don't know where they went, although suspect they fled when they heard we were coming. Regardless, we now are able to scavenge their relics for useful secrets.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPrecursorStudies_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Studies

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPrecursorStudies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor research to be better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPrecursorStudies_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings we put in charge of studying Precursor artifacts report that they require more resources to unlock their secrets. This had better be worth it, research slavelings.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPrecursorRelicFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Technologist

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPrecursorRelicFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor relic research to be better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPrecursorRelicFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: These Precursor artifacts are confusing to use, and most assume we have a completely different anatomy. We have ordered surgical procedures for the research slavelings to begin addressing this problem.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPrecursorRelicFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Cultural Studies

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPrecursorRelicFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor relic cultural benefits to be better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPrecursorRelicFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The slavelings seem fascinated at the very idea of a race that was more powerful than us. Perhaps they entertain dreams of being rescued. We shall encourage these dreams for now, to boost morale.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPrecursorRelicFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Capitalization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPrecursorRelicFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor relic economic benefits to be better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPrecursorRelicFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Some parts of Precursor relics are apparently useless, though they do glow and shimmer with strange lights. We shall sell these fragments to the easily distracted.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPrecursorExploitation_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Exploitation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPrecursorExploitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor research to be better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPrecursorExploitation_Dec
StringTable.String: The study of Precursor relics requires very specialized equipment and very specialized research slavelings. The ones with eyes that are slightly too small seem to do best at this work.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPrecursorEngineering_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Engineering

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPrecursorEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor research to be better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPrecursorEngineering_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings have tried recreating Precursor technology with occasionally disastrous results. For example, several have disappeared entirely. Still, if we keep this up, the benefits to us could be immeasurable.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPrecursorUnderstanding_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Understanding

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPrecursorUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Precursor research to be better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPrecursorUnderstanding_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now capable of plundering Precursor relics completely, and are probably as powerful as the Precursors were themselves. It is good for them that they're not around for us to have tried tasting them.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLifeSupport_Name
StringTable.String: Life Support

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLifeSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Better life support systems makes our ships go further.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLifeSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: Improving our life support systems will lead to improved ship's range and less mewling from the families of crews who have suffocated in space.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLifeSupportOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Improved Life Support

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLifeSupportOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to travel further.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLifeSupportOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: It turns out that our life support systems coming out of the factories didn't have the air recyclers turned on! Those silly manufacturing slavelings. We've fixed that now, giving our ships a much needed range boost.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLifeSupportOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Life Support Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLifeSupportOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our life support systems to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLifeSupportOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We've begun making our life support systems out of cheaper parts, because who is going to stop us?

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLifeSupportOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Life Support Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLifeSupportOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our life support systems to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLifeSupportOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: "Are all these parts really necessary?" we asked the research slavelings of our life support systems. They were, but we removed a few anyways.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSupportFieldGeneration_Name
StringTable.String: Support Field Generation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSupportFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advanced life support forces our crew to do more with less.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSupportFieldGeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: The trick to life support is to stop letting the crew decide what and when to eat. They will eat dense sludge. When we use fields to pipe it directly into their mouths.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSupportFieldFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Support Range Focus

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSupportFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to travel further.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSupportFieldFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Sometimes a crew member would close their mouth when we piped food into it, making a mess and wasting food. So we've started removing the crew member's jaw muscles, leading to improved efficiency.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSupportFieldFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Support Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSupportFieldFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our life support systems to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSupportFieldFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of the research slavelings found a way to make the nutrient sludge taste better. "Does it cost money?" we asked. It didn't. "Would the sludge be cheaper if it tasted worse?" It would. So we did that instead.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSupportFieldFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Support Systems

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSupportFieldFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our life support systems to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSupportFieldFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: If we simply turn one of the dials down on the life support systems, they use less food and are lighter than ever. Also, the crews now come back from space quite a bit lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPromethionSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Promethion Support Systems

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPromethionSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Exotic life support systems feed our crews less than ever.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPromethionSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: The Promethion Support System extends our support field methodology to its logical conclusion, and now pipes nutrients directly into our crews' necks.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLifeSupportMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Support System Assembly

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLifeSupportMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our life support systems to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLifeSupportMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: To make our life support systems cheaper, we continually threaten the research slavelings with personally testing them. You would not believe the speed with which they come up with ideas.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLifeSupportMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Support Mass Reduction

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLifeSupportMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our life support systems to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLifeSupportMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: We can't make our ships' crews eat any less, because they would die, and we still kind of need them. But we can make the systems that deliver the food lighter and flimsier.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLosslessSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Lossless Support Systems

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLosslessSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lossless life support systems humiliate our crews more than ever.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLosslessSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Making the crews eat their own waste was a moment of genius. The research slavelings will be absolutely despised for coming up with this one.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSupportFieldMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Support Field Mastery

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSupportFieldMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Support fields extend the range of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSupportFieldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: With only sludge and fields to move the sludge around in, there's no reason life support can't be handled by external vessels. And sludge delivery probes sent by an appropriately equipped facility should extend our range even further.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginExplorationExtention_Name
StringTable.String: Exploration Extension

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginExplorationExtention_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advanced support fields extend a fleet's range even more.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginExplorationExtention_Dec
StringTable.String: We can now generate Promethion support fields in crews' necks at a great distance, allowing our fleet-support vessels to do most of the work. And our starbase life support extension modules can now fire sludge probes further than ever before.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalManufacturing_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalManufacturing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: In orbit we can make bigger, meaner ships.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalManufacturing_Dec
StringTable.String: It takes special training for a slaveling to be able to construct things in orbit. And, we eventually discovered, helmets. But now that we've gone to the expense, we should be able to build bigger ships than ever.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Skilled Starship Construction

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force our Starports to work better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: We're getting better at building ships, which is good, because we're going to need a lot of them.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Improved Logistics

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force our infrastructure to be more efficient.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Moving things around in orbit is complicated and requires very intelligent slavelings making very big calculations. We've started yelling at them to make the calculations better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Storage Maximization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be packed tighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have an awful lot of pain to bestow upon the stars, so the more pain we can pack in our ships, the better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginZeroGravityConstruction_Name
StringTable.String: Zero Gravity Construction

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginZeroGravityConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build medium hulls.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginZeroGravityConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Making ships in orbit is tough because when construction workers fall off the thing they never stop falling. But if it means we'll be able to build bigger ships, screw 'em.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginZeroGravityOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Reinforcement

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginZeroGravityOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be tougher.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginZeroGravityOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The slavelings had several ideas how to make our hulls stronger, so we whipped them until they shut up. But then after thinking about it for a bit, we tried listening to them. This was a good idea, and we feel proud of it.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginZeroGravityOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Shipyard Efficiency

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginZeroGravityOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginZeroGravityOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: It's so much harder to threaten a slaveling when that slaveling has a powerful cutting torch. But we've found a way, and now our starports will be just a little bit more efficient at making ships.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginZeroGravityOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: High Capacity Hulls

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginZeroGravityOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be packed tighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginZeroGravityOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Space on ships is valuable, so we've forced the crew to have less for themselves. They will now work where they sleep which is also where they eat and make waste.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLargeScaleConstruction_Name
StringTable.String: Large Scale Construction

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLargeScaleConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build large hulls.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLargeScaleConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: It's taken a lot of work, a few collapsed hulls, and many missing slavelings, but we're now finally able to build large hulls.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalConstructionFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Hardened Hulls

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalConstructionFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be tougher.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalConstructionFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings believe that by introducing micro-cavities in the structure of our hulls, they will collapse in predictable ways, making them tougher. This seemed like a trick, but after much whipping, they assure us it isn't.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalConstructionFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Starship Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalConstructionFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalConstructionFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By simply giving our construction slavelings less air in their helmets, we've been able to make them work much faster and more efficiently.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalConstructionFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Capacity Focus

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalConstructionFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be packed tighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalConstructionFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: It turned out that we can cram more things into our ships if we just push harder.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMassiveScaleConstruction_Name
StringTable.String: Massive Scale Construction

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMassiveScaleConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build huge hulls.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMassiveScaleConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to build massive ships, that would make the stars themselves tremble if they had any sense.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHullMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Master Shipwrights

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHullMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHullMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Ships as big as the ones we're making have a lot of corners to be cut.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHullMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Maximization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHullMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our ships to be packed tighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHullMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ships are more crammed with death than ever before. Why would you cram them with anything else?

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHullStrengthening_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Strengthening

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHullStrengthening_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our hulls to be tougher.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHullStrengthening_Dec
StringTable.String: We've found a way to cram strengthening fields into the hulls of our vessels, which should make them tougher, or at the very least, chewier.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHullRepairSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Hull Repair Systems

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHullRepairSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build hull support and repair modules.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHullRepairSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: A hilarious industrial accident has revealed to our construction slavelings that the same field technology we use to strengthen our ships can be used to straighten damaged beams, thus partially repairing them.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSelfHealingHulls_Name
StringTable.String: Self Healing Hulls

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSelfHealingHulls_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build tactical repair modules.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSelfHealingHulls_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings finally invented friends for themselves, so naturally we're taking those friends away and sending them into battle. These tiny little self-replicating robots will be capable of repairing damage during combat.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCarrierTech_Name
StringTable.String: Carriers

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCarrierTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCarrierTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Carrier combat comes naturally to the Drengin, as all understand that the more Drengin shooting the better, even if some of those Drengin are in very small, very delicate ships that don't often come back.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCarrierFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Interceptor Drones

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCarrierFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Interceptor Drones

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCarrierFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: These little drones are fast and deadly, and more importantly cheap. They also have the added advantage of not requiring a crew, which saves lives.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCarrierFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Guardian Drones

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCarrierFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Guardian Drones.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCarrierFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: These Tough little drones will guard our Support and Capital ships to the end, and when they are destroyed, no lives are lost.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHighCapacityCarriers_Name
StringTable.String: High Capacity Carriers

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHighCapacityCarriers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build high capacity carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHighCapacityCarriers_Dec
StringTable.String: Once we design the next generation of smaller, more compact fighters, and begin selecting smaller, more compact pilots, we should be able to stack more of them into the same space.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarLogistics_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Logistics

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Logistics to be better. Lets us build mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: Logistics is so boring. We would make it a punishment, but if the people who do it are idiots then everything is made worse. So we put the most boring slavelings in charge of it. That seems to work.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLogisticalOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Logistics

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLogisticalOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Logistics to be better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLogisticalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: It turns out that the slavelings whose eyes are a little too close together are the best at logistics, so we've begun sifting them out of the pits and sending them into space.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLogisticalOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: High Output Mining

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLogisticalOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces mines to be more productive.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLogisticalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Asteroid mining sounds great, because it involves blasting the crap out of something. But it turns out there are all these details, and it's actually super boring. Anyways. We put some boring slavelings in charge of the details. That seems to help.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLogisticalOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Sustainable Starports

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLogisticalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces starports to decay less.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLogisticalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Starports don't just stay there being starports. They're always breaking down, which is crap. We put some boring slavelings in charge of making that not happen, which seems to have helped a bit.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginFleetLogisticsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Fleet Logistics

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginFleetLogisticsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Logistics to be way better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginFleetLogisticsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Unlike most species, it turns out the Drengin actually have an unusual aptitude for logistics, so long as it's framed in the context of deploying massive fleets of warships. The galaxy trembles at our orderly might!

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDeepSpaceLogistics_Name
StringTable.String: Deep Space Logistics

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDeepSpaceLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Logistics to be better still.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDeepSpaceLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we know how good logistics is at letting us dominate things, our logistics slavelings are celebrated throughout our culture. All compete for the honor of whipping them to logistic better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGalacticLogistics_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Logistics

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGalacticLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces Logistics to be the best.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGalacticLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: We can put more ships more places in the galaxy than ever before. What those ships will be used for is anyone's guess, although they'd better guess quick because those ships are about to shoot them.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarMining_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Mining

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Blowing up asteroids is easy, but blowing them up to get useful things out of them is not. There is too much thinking involved with it, so we let specialized mining slavelings do that for us.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHighEfficiencyMining_Name
StringTable.String: High Efficiency Mining

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHighEfficiencyMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our mining facilities to be better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHighEfficiencyMining_Dec
StringTable.String: The mining slavelings have gotten better at their jobs, probably because their jobs are super dangerous and they kept dying. Now, along with not dying, they mine more resources than ever before.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginResourceExtraction_Name
StringTable.String: Resource Extraction

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginResourceExtraction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build highly efficient extractors.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginResourceExtraction_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings have come up with an invention that will put many mining slavelings out of work: drones capable of independently mining resources.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLosslessMining_Name
StringTable.String: Lossless Mining

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLosslessMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build targeted resource extractors.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginLosslessMining_Dec
StringTable.String: With the right sensing equipment, and targeted nanoscale extractor heads, now even the rarest resources can be feasibly targeted for extraction. Still by mining slavelings working in cramped, hellish conditions though.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarfareTech_Name
StringTable.String: Warfare

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarfareTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: War isn't the only thing we're good at. But we are really good at it.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarfareTech_Dec
StringTable.String: It will be impossible for us to impose our will on the galaxy and eat its most edible species if we don't begin investing in weapons research.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWeaponsSystemsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Weapons Systems

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWeaponsSystemsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build basic guns.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWeaponsSystemsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Putting ships in space is pointless if those ships can't shoot other ships out of space.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWeaponsSpecializationTech1_Name
StringTable.String: Targeting Specialization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWeaponsSpecializationTech1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Accuracy of all weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWeaponsSpecializationTech1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have increased the targeting systems of our existing weapons substantially, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWeaponsSpecializationTech2_Name
StringTable.String: Miniaturization Specialization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWeaponsSpecializationTech2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Mass of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWeaponsSpecializationTech2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have reduced the mass of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWeaponsSpecializationTech3_Name
StringTable.String: Production Specialization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWeaponsSpecializationTech3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Cost of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWeaponsSpecializationTech3_Dec
StringTable.String: We have reduced the cost of our existing weapons systems, and what we have learned will apply to future weapons as well.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeamWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeamWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build stronger beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeamWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Beam weapons can cut things or burn things or look pretty. They are just great and we love them.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeamWeaponOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Focused Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeamWeaponOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our beam weapons to do more damage.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeamWeaponOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our research slavelings have created a new type of focusing crystal that makes our beam weapons even more damaging. Well done research slavelings, well done.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeamWeaponOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low-Cost Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeamWeaponOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our beam weapons to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeamWeaponOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: If there's a downside to beam weapons - and we still love them either way - it's their cost. We've been whipping the research slavelings steadily to see what they can do about that.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeamWeaponOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapons Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeamWeaponOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our beam weapons to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeamWeaponOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: There was an awful lot of unnecessary shielding around our beam weapons which we've ordered the slavelings to get rid of. No-one's supposed to be standing near those things when they go off anyways.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMatterDisruption_Name
StringTable.String: Matter Disruption

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMatterDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build advanced beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMatterDisruption_Dec
StringTable.String: Drengin have been using simple matter disruption weapons for centuries, because of our advanced capacity for causing pain. It took very little work to adapt these into ship-based weapons.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHighEnergyFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Amplification

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHighEnergyFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our beam weapons to do more damage.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHighEnergyFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings seem very excited about the latest advances in crystallography, claiming we'll soon be able to put much more energy into our beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHighEnergyFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHighEnergyFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our beam weapons to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHighEnergyFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The weapons slavelings have always claimed they needed a lot of time to individually tune each weapon as it was made. We suspected they were just being lazy. We were right. The weapons will be made faster and cheaper from now on.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHighEnergyFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHighEnergyFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our beam weapons to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHighEnergyFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons slavelings have found a better way to wrap the charge coils of our beam weapons, making them more efficient, and making room for more of them.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPlasmaProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Plasma Projection

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPlasmaProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build extra deadly beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPlasmaProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: Plasma is deadly stuff, and we went through many slavelings trying to figure out first how to contain it, and then how to point it away from the user. Their sacrifice is already forgotten.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeamWeaponMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Beam Assembly

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeamWeaponMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our beam weapons to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeamWeaponMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Making containment chambers for plasma weapons is slow, dangerous work. So we've ordered the slavelings to do it more quickly to minimize the danger.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeamWeaponMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeamWeaponMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our beam weapons to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeamWeaponMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons slavelings have found a way to make our beam weapons even lighter. "It is weird that the research slavelings did not do this," they say. "You should punish them." Oh those treacherous slavelings.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEnergyPhasing_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Phasing

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEnergyPhasing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build face-meltingly powerful beam weapons.
