StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEnergyPhasing_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings have outdone themselves this time, inventing a weapon which can evaporate enemy ships entirely. Our research slavelings are growing perhaps too powerful.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDoomRayTech_Name
StringTable.String: Doom Ray

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDoomRayTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build the ultimate beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDoomRayTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings are beginning to frighten us. Doom Rays are even more powerful than the phasers they're based on, capable of annihilating non-trivial parts of the universe.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeamWeaponAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeamWeaponAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces a fleet's beam weapons to be better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBeamWeaponAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Beam weapons are so appealing to Drengin sensibilities that we have mastered their use far in advance of the weaker species. For example, by augmenting their storage systems with an external field, we can increase the beam output of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHighEnergyTransfer_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Transfer

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHighEnergyTransfer_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces a fleet's beam weapons to be extra better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHighEnergyTransfer_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings have found a way to reduce the effectiveness of enemy shields, and to absorb enemy beam attacks directed at our own vessels. The research slavelings will receive a congratulatory beating for their hard work.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHighEnergyMagnification_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Magnification

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHighEnergyMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces a fleet's beam weapons to be much extra better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHighEnergyMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: We've found a way to make our fleet beam support systems even better. They didn't even need to be told to do this, that's how well the research slavelings know we like beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMissileWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Weapons

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMissileWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build better missiles.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMissileWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Missile weapons are simple, but there is nothing wrong with that. Destroying things doesn't always have to be this whole big thing.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMissileOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Rapid Fire Missiles

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMissileOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces missile launchers to shoot faster.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMissileOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons slavelings found a way to put more missiles into the missile launchers, meaning they can shoot faster now.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMissileOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Missiles

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMissileOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces missiles to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMissileOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Now we can make more missiles for less, which will be perfect for sharing with flimsy alien ships.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMissileOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMissileOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces missiles to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMissileOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: If we make the missile launchers lighter, we can put more missile launchers on our ships. If we put more missile launchers on our ships there will be less enemy ships. Math is fun.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHarpoonTech_Name
StringTable.String: Harpoons

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHarpoonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build angrier missiles.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHarpoonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Drengin are masters of things that go boom, and missiles are no exception. We've leaped well in front of the rest of the galaxy in our ability to blow up the rest of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarheadFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Warhead Acceleration

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarheadFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces missile launchers to shoot farther.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarheadFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The weapons slavelings seem to think that linked periods of acceleration and coasting will allow our missiles to blow things up from further away. If they're wrong they shall be blown up from close range.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarheadFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Warhead Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarheadFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces missiles to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarheadFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: After many weapons slavelings mysteriously disappeared in clouds of smoke, we finally mastered the latest generation of explosives. All of our missiles should now be much cheaper to make.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarheadFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Warheads

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarheadFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces missiles to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarheadFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Shaped-charge warheads mean we can make each individual missile lighter, leaving more room for other missile launchers or whatever else we want to carry. Probably still going to be more missile launchers if we're honest.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPhotonicWarheads_Name
StringTable.String: Photonic Warheads

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPhotonicWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build exotic missiles.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPhotonicWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings have found a way for our warheads to use high energy bursts of photons to pierce an enemy's hull at the moment of impact. Our missiles are now much more dangerous. And pretty.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPayloadMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Missile Assembly

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPayloadMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces missiles to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPayloadMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: After many beatings and demonstration "missile rides" for disobedient slavelings, our missile manufacturing process is now almost perfectly efficient.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPayloadMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Warheads

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPayloadMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces missiles to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPayloadMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings have found that our warheads can be made more efficient. "More powerful?" we asked. But no. Just lighter. Which is good, but we beat them anyways.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPhotonTorpedos_Name
StringTable.String: Photon Torpedoes

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPhotonTorpedos_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build crazy dangerous missiles.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPhotonTorpedos_Dec
StringTable.String: They used a lot of big words - wide-spectrum, photon-encasement, bang - but the basic idea the research slavelings were trying to get across is that we have a new type of super deadly missile.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginNightmareTorpedoTech_Name
StringTable.String: Nightmare Torpedoes

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginNightmareTorpedoTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build world ending missiles.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginNightmareTorpedoTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings may have gone a little far this time. Missiles that contain small singularities? Yikes. Still, let's fire a few off at some weaklings just to see if they work.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMissileAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMissileAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces a fleet's missile weapons to be better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMissileAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Once we started shooting missiles at things, we liked it. A lot. Using Drengin ingenuity, our military technicians found a way to improve the tracking and range of the missiles, giving us a huge advantage over punier races.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAdvancedMissileGuidance_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Missile Guidance

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAdvancedMissileGuidance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces a fleet's missile weapons to be extra better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAdvancedMissileGuidance_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings have thought of a way to make our missiles work better against coward aliens who hide behind point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIntelligentWarheads_Name
StringTable.String: Intelligent Warheads

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIntelligentWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces a fleet's missile weapons to be much extra better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginIntelligentWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: Our research slavelings have found a way to completely neutralize an enemy's point defense systems. Which is good, because we were really starting to hate those things.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Weapons

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build better kinetic weapons

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Kinetic weapons will tear holes in the ships and faces of those who stand in the way of Drengin might, and also anyone standing directly behind those people.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Range Extension

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our kinetic weapons to shoot further.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings have found a way to extend the range of our kinetic weapons using smaller projectiles, bigger magnets, and tricky math.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Weapon Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our kinetic weapons to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: The slavelings responsible for making weapons have found a way to make electromagnets without getting crushed by the electromagnets. We go through far less slavelings while making them now.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our kinetic weapons to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: After much whipping, the research slavelings have found several ways to save weight on our kinetic weapons. They should have done this in the first place, and have been whipped for their insolence.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPulseCannonTech_Name
StringTable.String: Pulse Cannons

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPulseCannonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build more deadly kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPulseCannonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Pulse cannons are the latest way we have of making things into smaller things. Our intelligence slavelings report that we are far ahead of the rest of the galaxy in this important field.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticAccelerationFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Frictionless Acceleration

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticAccelerationFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our kinetic weapons to shoot further.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticAccelerationFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Smaller projectiles sound like a bad thing, and many research slavelings were whipped for suggesting it. But if they go faster and shoot further, that's a good thing. Many research slavelings were whipped for explaining this.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticAccelerationFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Accelerators

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticAccelerationFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our kinetic weapons to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticAccelerationFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: We've found a source of components that are so durable that not even our incompetent manufacturing slavelings can damage them, making our kinetic weapons cheaper to make.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticAccelerationFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Accelerators

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticAccelerationFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our kinetic weapons to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticAccelerationFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings have invented new low-resistance electromagnets that will give our kinetic weapons a lot more ouch per weight.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGravitonThrower_Name
StringTable.String: Graviton Thrower

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGravitonThrower_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build very dangerous kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGravitonThrower_Dec
StringTable.String: Our newest guns can shoot pulses of gravitons at things we don't like, which can rip apart those things from the inside. That will teach them to be more likable.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Accelerator Assembly

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our kinetic weapons to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: We recently discovered that the weapons manufacturing slavelings were working slowly because working around massive electromagnets was dangerous and they wanted to live. We've put a stop to that.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Accelerators

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our kinetic weapons to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: With much whipping and yelling and breaks for frozen treats, we've coaxed the research slavelings into shaving a bit more weight off of our kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginQuantumDrivers_Name
StringTable.String: Quantum Drivers

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginQuantumDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build impossibly deadly kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginQuantumDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: Quantum Drivers will let us shoot our future food sources with mass that doesn't even exist yet.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSingularityDrivers_Name
StringTable.String: Singularity Drivers

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSingularityDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build the ultimate kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSingularityDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: We're not sure how the research slavelings are able to make micro singularities, and are a little worried that they know how and we don't. But for the time being, they're willing to share, and they're great for shooting at things we hate.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces a fleet's kinetic weapons to be better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKineticAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: We're way ahead of the rest of the food species with this invention, which makes all the kinetic weapons in a fleet more dangerous. Take that, food species.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMassManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Mass Manipulation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMassManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces a fleet's kinetic weapons to be extra better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMassManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings found a way to make our fleet support systems even better. Also, now our slugs can penetrate armor better, giving the food species less places to hide.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInertialMagnification_Name
StringTable.String: Inertial Magnification

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInertialMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces a fleet's kinetic weapons to be much extra better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInertialMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: Now our kinetic weapons can fracture armor entirely, leaving the food species utterly helpless and tenderized.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMilitarizationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Militarization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMilitarizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build military shipyards and defense platforms.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMilitarizationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: There's no point building something if it can't be used for fighting in or with or on.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMilitarySpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Enhanced Training

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMilitarySpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our soldiers to be better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMilitarySpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: It take a lot of effort and a lot of leashes to stop Drengin from fighting and eating each other. But now that we have those leashes in place, our soldiers should be that much hungrier for the food species.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMilitarySpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Fortifications

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMilitarySpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our planetary defenses to be better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMilitarySpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: If the unthinkable happens, and the food species attack us, they will soon find that even the lowliest Drengin slaveling is a match for their bravest warriors. Also, we don't feed the slavelings much, so they will be hungry.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMilitarySpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Resistance Forces

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMilitarySpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase our colonies ability to resist invaders.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginMilitarySpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By training our population in basic resistance tactics, we can help them be ready for anything. A prepared population can often be the difference between victory and defeat when invaded.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarMachine_Name
StringTable.String: War Machine

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarMachine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build Garrisons.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWarMachine_Dec
StringTable.String: The mere presence of Drengin troops is enough to intimidate our manufacturing slavelings into making guns more quickly. And the troops will of course be useful for killing and eating any food that lands on the planet.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPlanetaryInvasion_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Invasion

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPlanetaryInvasion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build transports to invade planets.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPlanetaryInvasion_Dec
StringTable.String: For millennia the Drengin have looked at the stars and dreamed of eating the things there. Those dreams are now a reality.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInvasionOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Bombardment

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInvasionOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Planetary Bombardments to be conducted during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInvasionOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Dropping heavy things on things has long been a favorite pastime of Drengin children. And taking it into space hasn't made it any less fun.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInvasionOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Information Warfare

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInvasionOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Informational Warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInvasionOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Information warfare sounds boring and dumb, but if we can cripple a food species' defenses before we land, they will become food far more easily.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInvasionOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Biological Warfare

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInvasionOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Biological Warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInvasionOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Biological warfare is cruel and vicious and wildly immoral. But there are also downsides, for example the way it turns the food species into poison.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginStallerMarines_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Marines

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginStallerMarines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginStallerMarines_Dec
StringTable.String: A greater understanding of the tactics and training required for effective ground-based combat has led to a new form of military unit which specializes in establishing beachheads in unfriendly gravity wells.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGravitationalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Tidal Disruption

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGravitationalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows tidal disruption tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGravitationalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The Drengin empire is so terrifying that even the sea trembles at the sight of our advancing transports!

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGravitationalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Core Detonation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGravitationalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows core detonation tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGravitationalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Now we can make a planet suddenly experience massive, worldwide volcanic activity. This will be lots of fun and we promise to take many pictures.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDroneSoldiers_Name
StringTable.String: Drone Soldiers

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDroneSoldiers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces soldiers to be more effective and transports to carry more.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDroneSoldiers_Dec
StringTable.String: Using drone soldiers feels like cheating, robbing natural Drengin of the chance to rip an enemy's neck out themselves. But there's no denying the neck-ripping potential of these new drones.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAdvancedInvasionTactics_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Invasion Tactics

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAdvancedInvasionTactics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces soldiers to be more effective and transports to carry more.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAdvancedInvasionTactics_Dec
StringTable.String: Our research slavelings have come up with a new type of transport which is capable of firing soldiers out of it like a gun. This lets us deploy soldiers faster and more hilariously than ever.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginFortification_Name
StringTable.String: Bombardment Shelters

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginFortification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides stronger defense against planetary bombardment.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginFortification_Dec
StringTable.String: Hiding is a very un-Drenginly thing to do, but when we're hiding from things moving at several kilometers a second that are aimed directly at our heads, there's some sense to it.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDefensiveFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Information Systems Hardening

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDefensiveFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies Immune to Planetary Bombardment.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDefensiveFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Informational warfare is a cowardly way to fight, and if any food species try this on us, they won't get far. Come at us honestly, food species.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDefensiveFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Adaptive Vaccinations

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDefensiveFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies Immune to Information Warfare.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDefensiveFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: With the right vaccinations for our colonists, soon even alien bacteria and viruses will tremble at the might of Drengin immune systems!

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDefensiveFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Defense Platform

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDefensiveFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies Immune to Biological Warfare.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDefensiveFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Killing the food species before they even land on our planets is, at heart, a waste of food. But if there's lots of food to go around, it may still be worth considering.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalDefencePlatform_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Defense Platform

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalDefencePlatform_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of planetary defense dome, improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginOrbitalDefencePlatform_Dec
StringTable.String: Our research slavelings have used the properties of hemispheres to encase our most valuable buildings in powerful shields, protecting them from orbital bombardment.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDefenseSystemTech_Name
StringTable.String: Defense Systems

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDefenseSystemTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build defensive systems for our ships.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDefenseSystemTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We can't pretend that the food species will be happy to find out that they're food. Many of them might even fight back. And that's part of the fun! We should just be able to not die when they do that.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDefensiveSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Specialization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDefensiveSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our shields to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDefensiveSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Although we want to keep our ship's crews alive, there's no reason we need to spend too much money on it. They don't need to be spoiled.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDefensiveSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Specialization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDefensiveSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of point defenses.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDefensiveSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our point defenses are better at shooting down missiles now, because someone finally explained to the research slavelings about the importance of "leading" a target.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDefensiveSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Specialization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDefensiveSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our armor to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDefensiveSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: We were able to save a lot of weight on our armor systems by putting real cheap stuff over the crew quarters.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Systems

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build better shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Shields are even better at stopping enemy attacks than deflector fields. Our ship captains have no more excuse for dying now.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Enhancement

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our shields to be stronger.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The ship's crews pointed out that if we make their shields stronger that they'd die less. "And?" we said. Then they said they'd be able to kill more. "There you go," we said. Anyways, their shields are a little stronger now.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Shield Systems

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our shields to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Spending less money on shields is good because it means more money for other things. Weapons, basically.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our shields to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Completely by accident, one of our manufacturing slavelings invented a more efficient type of field generator for our shields. He has been promoted to research slaveling and received a congratulatory whipping.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBarrierFieldGeneration_Name
StringTable.String: Barrier Field Generation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBarrierFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build really great shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBarrierFieldGeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: Barrier Fields are capable of absorbing some of the energy of weapon strikes. Now, when the food species try to kill us it just makes our shields stronger and us angrier.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBarrierSystemFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: High Output Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBarrierSystemFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our shields to be stronger.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBarrierSystemFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our first Barrier Field systems occasionally exploded violently. We think this was because the research slavelings were playing a prank. We've fixed that now and scolded the research slavelings.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBarrierSystemFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBarrierSystemFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our shields to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBarrierSystemFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The manufacturing slavelings have found a few ways to make shield systems cheaper than ever before. They will be beaten for their excellence.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBarrierSystemFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBarrierSystemFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our shields to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBarrierSystemFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: With some new inventions called super conductors, our shield systems are lighter than ever. The research slavelings should have invented those a long time ago.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginForceFieldTech_Name
StringTable.String: Force Fields

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginForceFieldTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build exotic shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginForceFieldTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our latest shields can focus their energy on the point of enemy attack, making them much stronger than before. The stupid food species can't hurt us now.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Shield Assembly

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our shields to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our manufacturing slavelings are so good at their jobs that we can now use less of them to make the same number of shields. The extra slavelings will be sent on vacation. To the mines.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Shield Generators

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our shields to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our shields are now as light as they will ever be according to the research slavelings. They say that kind of thing a lot, but always change their mind after more whipping. We shall proceed as per normal then.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInvulnerabilityTech_Name
StringTable.String: Invulnerability

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInvulnerabilityTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build the best shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInvulnerabilityTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings promise that these new shields will make our ships "basically invulnerable." Any ships that die with these shields will result in much punishment for the research slavelings.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Support Systems

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: We now have a system which lets us boost the shields of an entire fleet. Drengin fleets just became even worse news for the food species.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build better shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginShieldAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: We found a way to make our fleet shield supports even better. We're so good at war now that we don't even really have to try any more.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPointDefenses_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPointDefenses_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build better point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPointDefenses_Dec
StringTable.String: More guns sounds like a great idea, but it turns out that these guns are just for shooting other guns, which makes them just an ok idea.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPointDefenseOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Smart Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPointDefenseOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our point defenses to be better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPointDefenseOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: As soon as we stopped using our cheapest railguns for point defense systems, they started working better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPointDefenseOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPointDefenseOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our point defenses to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPointDefenseOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: There's no reason to spend so much money on keeping ship's crews alive. Keeping ships alive is ok, we guess, but even then, let's not go crazy.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPointDefenseOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPointDefenseOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our point defenses to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPointDefenseOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings realized we could use smaller slugs in our point defenses and they'd still be able to shoot the bad guys' missiles.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCounterMeasures_Name
StringTable.String: Counter Measures

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCounterMeasures_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build even better point defenses.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCounterMeasures_Dec
StringTable.String: Confusing enemy missiles sounds like a cowardly thing to do, but the research slavelings promise that its actually smart, and that it will make our ships tougher to kill.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCounterMeasureFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Adaptive Counter Measures

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCounterMeasureFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our point defenses to be better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCounterMeasureFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: The treacherous food species are always looking for ways to shoot us. Stronger point defenses should help stop that.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCounterMeasureFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Counter Measure Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCounterMeasureFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our point defenses to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCounterMeasureFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our first counter measure systems were clumsy and expensive to make. Now that the manufacturing slavelings have some practice at it, they can make them much cheaper. And they'd better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCounterMeasureFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Low Mass Counter Measures

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCounterMeasureFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our point defenses to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCounterMeasureFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The manufacturing slavelings have gotten very good at finding ways to save weight in these counter measure systems. It is good to see them taking pride in their horrible, degrading work.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDroneSentrySystems_Name
StringTable.String: Drone Sentry Systems

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDroneSentrySystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build exotic point defenses.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDroneSentrySystems_Dec
StringTable.String: We've tried installing our point defense systems on drones. Although it feels bad giving guns to a drone, at least they can do all their shooting and exploding at a safe distance from our ships.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDroneSystemMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Point Defense Assembly

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDroneSystemMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our point defenses to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDroneSystemMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: The nice thing about using drones in combat roles is that they don't complain when you cut corners on the equipment you provide them.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDroneSystemMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDroneSystemMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our point defenses to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDroneSystemMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: A mistake by the manufacturing slavelings resulted in the point defense drones going out with a lot of parts. But it didn't make any difference at all in their performance. The manufacturing slaves have been both punished and rewarded for their mistake.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArreonMissileDefenseTech_Name
StringTable.String: Aereon Missile Defense

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArreonMissileDefenseTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build the ultimate point defenses.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArreonMissileDefenseTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings have taken everything they know about cowering and equipped our new Aereon drones with the latest railguns, ECM and smart chafe. Enemy missiles tremble at the sight of a Drengin vessel now.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPointDefenseSupportSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Support

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPointDefenseSupportSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build fleet point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPointDefenseSupportSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: With this new long range missile tracking system, every ship in our fleet should have even less to fear from enemy missiles than they had before.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPointDefenseAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Augmentation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPointDefenseAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build even better fleet point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPointDefenseAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Entire fleets of Drengin ships can now be protected with the latest point defense attacking technology. The food species better have another type of gun handy.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Systems

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build tougher armor.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Armor is simple and we like that. Put heavy things between us and the bad guy, then laugh at the bad guy. Simple. Good.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Reinforced Armor

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our armor to be stronger.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: The slavelings tried bolting the armor plates on in a new way, and it seems to make our ships a bit tougher. The panels fall off way less, for one thing.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low-Cost Armor

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our armor to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We went through quite a few slavelings before we realized the benefit of only using the strongest ones for armor work. But now that we have, we should be able to manufacture armor panels much more cheaply.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our armor to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our slavelings found a way to make our armor panels fit just a little bit tighter, meaning we can use less of them. The armor panels that is. We will still, as always, continue to go through a lot of slavelings.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDurantiumCompositeTech_Name
StringTable.String: Durantium Composite

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDurantiumCompositeTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build way tougher armor.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDurantiumCompositeTech_Dec
StringTable.String: When we stack certain materials on top of each other, they're much harder than just dumb old metal. The research slavelings call these new composites Durantium, and promise they'll make our ships much less explodey.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Lamination

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our armor to be stronger.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: One of our slavelings fell in the armor forge, and his remains formed an interesting crust between two layers of the armor, making it somewhat stronger. I don't need to tell you what we did next. But we are running low on slavelings if you need a hint.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Manufacturing Focus

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our armor to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we're using composites to make our armor, we can use weaker, cheaper slavelings to do much of the preliminary lamination work.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Mass Reduction

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our armor to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: We promised the research slavelings they could eat the weight savings they could find in our latest Durantium composites. They came up with a few savings, but did not seem happy when we put armor slabs in their food dishes and laughed.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKanviumLaminateTech_Name
StringTable.String: Kanvium Laminate

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKanviumLaminateTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build exotic armor.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginKanviumLaminateTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Kanvium armor partially turns to fluid when shocked, giving incoming projectiles a ferocious hug that terrifies them into stopping. At least that's what we like to think is happening.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: Master Armorers

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our armor to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: We found a way to make our armor manufacturing process a little cheaper. All it took was exposing the slavelings to harsh chemicals, which feels like something we should have discovered ages ago.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: High Density Armor

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our armor to be lighter.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: According to our manufacturing slavelings, if we make some minor changes to the design of our ships, they'll be far easier to armor. "And they'll look meaner," they added. So all right then.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginZeroPointArmorTech_Name
StringTable.String: Zero Point Armor

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginZeroPointArmorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build the ultimate armor.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginZeroPointArmorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Zero point armor is madness, and we're pretty sure the research slavelings are lying when they describe how it works. What seems undeniable though, is how tough it is.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Support Systems

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build fleet armor-support fields.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: By using the same force fields our slavelings use to make armor plating, we can create ship-based emitters that harden other ships at a distance. Drengin fleets just got a lot harder to chew.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorEnhancement_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Enhancement

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build better fleet armor-support fields.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginArmorEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: The research slavelings found a way to improve our hardening fields by doing something with "poles" and "science." Whatever they did, our ships are burlier than ever.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCommunicationsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Intimidation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCommunicationsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us research technology for intimidating our food.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCommunicationsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The other races of this galaxy will all be slaves and food for us eventually, but until that day, we may have to yell at them. And we'll need tools for doing that.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTranslatorTech_Name
StringTable.String: Universal Translator

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTranslatorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us communicate with our food.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTranslatorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We've met enough species now to finally figure out what they mean when they flap their mouth parts in those disgusting ways. It turns out they were pleading for their lives.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDiplomaticSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomatic Reasoning

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDiplomaticSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our Diplomats to be better.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDiplomaticSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: We've given our diplomats rubber masks depicting horrible alien faces, and told them to begin role-playing as the food species to better understand them. The results are hilarious, and surprisingly effective.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDiplomaticSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Influential Voice

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDiplomaticSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Spreads Drengin glory further.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDiplomaticSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: By sharing Drengin culture with the food species, we can begin preparing them for their new role in our empire.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDiplomaticSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Efficient Administrators

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDiplomaticSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the number of Administrators your Civilization can support.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDiplomaticSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: As our Civilization grows, we find ourselves needing more and more Administrators to oversee our far flung Starbases.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarGovernance_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Governance

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Stellar Empire form of government, and increases our Administrative capacity.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: Maintaining order is difficult in a civilization this big, and even the slave masters get a bit rowdy when they're a long way from the capital. Who shall whip the whippers? A Stellar Empire essentially creates a pyramid of whipping.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Slave-Master Party

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Federalist Party.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A weak central government that offloads most of its power to regional overseers has certain advantages. Local taskmasters seem best suited for encouraging economic development for example.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Coddling Party

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Populist Party.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Being nice to the slavelings feels unnatural and limits our strength, although it does diminish the chance of slaveling revolts. Also, the food species in the galaxy really like it when we do this, improving our diplomatic relations.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Dominion Party

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Universalist Party.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: A Dominion government takes a balanced approach to governing, and attempts to dominate, humiliate, and make irate all of its citizens equally.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGalacticGovernance_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Governance

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGalacticGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Galactic Republic form of government, and increases our Administrative capacity.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGalacticGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: By giving everyone a say over the control of the government, and then making that say extremely limited, we'll ensure everyone in our civilization is happier and more productive without having to give up any actual power to do so.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Plundering Party

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Industrialist Party.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: If it's not going to be stripped of its resources, what good is a galaxy for? This philosophy of governing turns our whole empire towards production, and says to hell with the consequences.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Thievery Party

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Mercantile Party.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: If we gear our civilization towards trade - especially unfair trade - we can profit greatly from the cowardly food species who we deal with. And the exposure our traders will have with the food species will make them excellent spies.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Smart Party

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Technologist Party.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Our research slavelings are lovable scamps, and by dedicating all of our civilization to provide the necessary beatings to support their work, we can build up a massive technological advantage over the food species.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarDemocracyTech_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Democracy

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarDemocracyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Interstellar Democracy form of government, and increases our Administrative capacity.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarDemocracyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Democracy is an unsettling idea to the Drengin, but we can probably fake it well enough to get the same benefits. The increase in slaveling happiness and the boost to our markets will be worth the trouble.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalMastery1_Name
StringTable.String: War Party

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalMastery1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of War Party.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalMastery1_Dec
StringTable.String: This is what we've been building to, what all Drengin have secretly hoped for their whole lives. An entire civilization dedicated to consuming other civilizations. The mouth waters.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalMastery2_Name
StringTable.String: Pre-War Party

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalMastery2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Pacifist Party.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginPoliticalMastery2_Dec
StringTable.String: Theoretically, a civilization could not be conducting war or trying to eat its neighbors. A so called "Pre-War" party might promote culture, social welfare, or crazy crap like that.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginStarFederationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Star Federation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginStarFederationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Star Federation form of government, and increases our Administrative capacity.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginStarFederationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: A Star Federation is designed to make everyone, Drengin, slaveling, and captured food species, as happy and productive as possible.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDiplomacyTech_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomacy

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDiplomacyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of embassies and the formation of basic treaties.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDiplomacyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Sometimes we might want to eat a species, but not be ready for them yet. In those cases, if we can convince the food species to not build any guns, it will make their eventual consumption easier.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDiplomaticOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Economic Treaty

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDiplomaticOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows formation of economic treaties.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDiplomaticOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Something which makes us wealthy sounds good. Something which makes food races wealthy sounds bad. Treaties are tricky business.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDiplomaticOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Treaty

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDiplomaticOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows formation of cultural treaties.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDiplomaticOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: If we can cram Drengin culture down the throats of other species, we can hope to increase the Influence we have on our neighbors and eventually make them better slavelings when we get around to conquering them.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDiplomaticOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Research Treaty

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDiplomaticOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows formation of research treaties.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginDiplomaticOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Sharing our research data with a food species is a dangerous business, no matter what we get in return. They could use that knowledge against us. Although we could also use their knowledge against them. Tough decision.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarAlliances_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Alliances

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarAlliances_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Let us build improved diplomatic buildings. Increases Diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarAlliances_Dec
StringTable.String: Turning a food species into an ally is a tough idea to wrap our head around. But if it makes other food species easier to process, there might be some merit to it.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAllianceFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Military Alliance

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAllianceFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows formation of military alliances.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAllianceFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: With a formal military alliance, we can make friendly food species fight the other kinds. Suddenly diplomacy doesn't seem so bad.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAllianceFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Technological Alliance

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAllianceFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows formation of technological alliances.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAllianceFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Sharing research secrets with a food species is a tough thing to consider. But if we're really sure we're not going to eat them for awhile, there might be some benefit to it.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAllianceFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Alliance

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAllianceFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows formation of cultural alliances.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginAllianceFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: If we can convince the friendly food species to swallow more of our ideas, we can make them so similar to the Drengin that they might not need to be eaten after all.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEminenceTech_Name
StringTable.String: Eminence

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEminenceTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build advanced diplomatic buildings. Increases Diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEminenceTech_Dec
StringTable.String: No-one was more surprised than we were to discover that the Drengin are considered the most respected and fair-minded people in the galaxy. People listen to our words now. Our words!

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_Name
StringTable.String: United Planets Lobbyist

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks additional Resolutions to be proposed.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to some well chosen words, extremely firm handshakes, and one intense staring contest, we now have far more authority in the United Planets than we used to.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginUnitedPlanetsClout_Name
StringTable.String: United Planets Clout

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginUnitedPlanetsClout_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks more powerful Resolutions to be proposed.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginUnitedPlanetsClout_Dec
StringTable.String: The food species who have made themselves our allies will now start voting with us on all United Planets measures. Good pets.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalInfluence_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Influence

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalInfluence_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build boring civilian buildings.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalInfluence_Dec
StringTable.String: Making people happy is distasteful, but it's also sadly a sometimes necessary aspect of empire building.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Passionate Representation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces others to like us more.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: It took us a long time to notice, but there are people in the galaxy who don't hate us. They... like us? And now we can do things to make more of them like us, however weird and wrong that feels.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Efficient Representation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our cultural buildings to be cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Spending money on culture is a garbage idea and we hate it. Building the cheapest possible buildings to house our cultural products is one way to show our disdain.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Self Sufficient Representation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces cultural buildings to cost less to run.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The art slavelings mewl continuously for more supplies. So we give them less supplies. That will teach them for asking.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalOutreach_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Outreach

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalOutreach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build improved boring civilian buildings.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalOutreach_Dec
StringTable.String: Are we sure we want to dedicate so much effort to enhancing our culture? This feels wrong and dangerous. Our ancestors are surely beating their chest plates in anger and confusion.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Research-Focused Culture

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Influence on research planets.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Entertainment programs which mock the hilarious mishaps which keep happening to our research slavelings might better spread the influence of our research-heavy planets.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Approval-Focused Culture

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Influence on planets with high approval.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A culture which shows how great Drengin leadership is sounds like a great idea. We're pretty great, right? Full of fun cooking and punishment shows, this culture should see planets with high approval increase their influence.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Wealth-Focused Culture

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Influence on wealthy planets.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: A culture which shows how great the wealthy are, eating and whipping things with much flair and style, will be immensely popular with our wealthy folk, and help spread their influence.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginStellarEmigration_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Emigration

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginStellarEmigration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build advanced cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginStellarEmigration_Dec
StringTable.String: There are certain people in the galaxy who like the Drengin way of life. "Seriously?" we ask. But yes. Anyways, if we can encourage more Drengin to travel the stars, spreading our glory, we can increase our influence.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalAssimilation_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Assimilation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalAssimilation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build exotic cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalAssimilation_Dec
StringTable.String: The people who arrive here from the food species are full of garbage ideas. By forcing Drengin culture into them, we can increase the penetration of our culture and influence more than ever.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalDomination_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Domination

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalDomination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Let us build the ultimate cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalDomination_Dec
StringTable.String: Our culture is the only one in the galaxy worth considering, and all who follow a lesser path will soon be beaten or eaten by our many acolytes.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalAffinity_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Affinity

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalAffinity_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Prepares civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCulturalAffinity_Dec
StringTable.String: There are other universes out there which have yet to experience the delight of having Drengin jaws clamp around their necks. Our research and philosophy slavelings are finding ways to change that.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginXenoCommerce_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Commerce

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginXenoCommerce_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic economic buildings and freighters.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginXenoCommerce_Dec
StringTable.String: Spending money to make money is a tricky concept, as we can also spend money on mass drivers, which seem more immediately helpful. But the large headed slavelings insist this will eventually lead to a stronger empire.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCommerceSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Wealthy Population

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCommerceSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces planets to be wealthier.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCommerceSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our planets need to make more money, and we've found that by putting up billboards that promise death for everyone who isn't wealthy, we can encourage just that.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCommerceSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Supportive Population

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCommerceSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces planets to be happier.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCommerceSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Forcing people to like us is tricky business, as all of our good forcing techniques actually make people like us less. But if we use all of our forcing techniques at once, that seems to do the trick.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCommerceSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Designated Trading Partner

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCommerceSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces a planet to trade more.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginCommerceSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: If we make our slavelings spend their free time manufacturing small, tradable trinkets, we should boost the trade income of a particular planet. We'll have to give the slavelings free time first, though.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginXenoEconomics_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Economics

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginXenoEconomics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build improved economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginXenoEconomics_Dec
StringTable.String: If we build bigger and fancier buildings to make more money, we'll be able to eventually afford bigger and fancier guns to take more money. Economics is fun when you put it in terms you understand.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBlackMarketTech_Name
StringTable.String: Black Market

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBlackMarketTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build a Black Market.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginBlackMarketTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Despite our best efforts, the slavelings often come into possession of various bits of money. By giving them a place to trade, we can boost their productivity, improving manufacturing and research.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarBanking_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Banking

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarBanking_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build advanced economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarBanking_Dec
StringTable.String: The Drengin and clever slavelings responsible for our economy are sometimes a bit too clever. Regulations and brutal public punishments may be necessary to bring some order to our banking system.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEconomicFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Economy

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEconomicFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Forces our trade routes to make more money.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEconomicFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By giving our traders bigger guns and twitchier eyes, we can improve their negotiating power substantially, leading to more money for us.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEconomicFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Well Crafted Treaties

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEconomicFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Diplomatic trade income

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEconomicFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: It turns out that if you just stop blinking during negotiations, you can get way better terms from whoever's sitting across from you. We're removing our negotiators' eyelids as we speak.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEconomicFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Tourism Board

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEconomicFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Force tourists to spend more money.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginEconomicFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: By imposing entry fees, exit taxes, gravity tariffs, and mandatory survival payments on all foreign tourists who pass through our domain, we can ensure they leave more of their money behind.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginFinancialSectorsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Financial Sectors

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginFinancialSectorsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build exotic economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginFinancialSectorsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: It is a little worrying the degree to which some Drengin dedicate themselves to making money. Because they're still Drengin, and still completely depraved. Even more exotic regulations and punishments may be needed.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGalacticStockMarket_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Stock Market

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGalacticStockMarket_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build the ultimate economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGalacticStockMarket_Dec
StringTable.String: The Drengin who believe that they can own something without pressing their boot into its neck are a confusing bunch. But they insist that this idea of a "stock market" will let them create wealth faster than ever before.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarTrade_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Trade

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginInterstellarTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: We shall send many Drengin to other planets, only not with guns, but with incredible goods. Sounds strange, but it's worth a try. They may also still carry some guns.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTradeOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Route Optimization

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTradeOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases overall value of trade routes

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTradeOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: By optimizing both the outgoing and receiving ends of our trade routes we have been able to achieve a modest overall profit for everyone involved.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTradeOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Expanded Trade

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTradeOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the establishment of one additional trade route.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTradeOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We believe the best way to increase trade income is the establish more trade routes. With a bit of effort we have been able to stretch our recourses enough to establish one more.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGalacticTrade_Name
StringTable.String: Market Extortion

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGalacticTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Let us build improved trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGalacticTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: If we demand traders establish fixed bases to store their goods here, it will make it far easier to threaten them and then take those goods.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTradeFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Tariff Stations

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTradeFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: All starbases now give a significant boost to the trade income of colonies with their Area of Effect.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTradeFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By establishing a tariff stations on our starbases we have been able to increase our cut of trade route profits.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTradeFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Route Focus

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTradeFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the establishment of one additional trade route

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTradeFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: More trade routes, more trade income, who no need for Tariffs, or 'Luxury items', Some times its best to stick to the basics.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGalacticFacilitation_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Facilitation

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGalacticFacilitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build advanced trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGalacticFacilitation_Dec
StringTable.String: We were going through cargo slavelings a little too quickly, and so have developed new, advanced trading facilities with features like cranes, and safety railings.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginFightingPits_Name
StringTable.String: Fighting Pits

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginFightingPits_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build Fighting Pits.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginFightingPits_Dec
StringTable.String: There are few things more relaxing than watching two other creatures fight each other to the death, or even just to the 'really badly hurt.' Our new fighting pits should boost Approval everywhere they're built.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTournamentTech_Name
StringTable.String: Tournaments

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTournamentTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build an Arena.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginTournamentTech_Dec
StringTable.String: By organizing our regional fighting pits into tournament brackets, and inviting the best and most depraved fighters from other nearby worlds, we can ensure that the Arena is a fun time for the entire family.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSaughtertoriumTech_Name
StringTable.String: Saughtertorium

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSaughtertoriumTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build a Slaughtertorium.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSaughtertoriumTech_Dec
StringTable.String: A slaughtertorium will serve as more than a means to amuse the local populace, but also attract tourists from around the galaxy who might be interested in seeing what the insides of various creatures look like.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginApprovalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Easy to Please

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginApprovalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the morale of your colonies.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginApprovalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered that we can make people feel more confident and happy. With proper messaging, we can keep our citizens happy without all that costly infrastructure.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginApprovalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Easily Distracted

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginApprovalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes building Entertainment Improvements much cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginApprovalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered that our efforts in keeping our people distracted have paid off. We can now build anything, and they will think it is fun.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginApprovalFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Eager to Please

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginApprovalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly reduces the Maintenance required by Entertainment Improvements.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginApprovalFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Not only are our people easier to please, they will now do most of the work it takes to distract themselves, for free.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSuperiorHunting_Name
StringTable.String: Hunting Grounds

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSuperiorHunting_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build Hunting Grounds.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginSuperiorHunting_Dec
StringTable.String: Hunting Grounds will give particularly wealthy individuals the opportunity to hunt and kill some of the most beautiful and delicate animals from around the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGalacticCruseLines_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Cruise Lines

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGalacticCruseLines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build tourism structures.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginGalacticCruseLines_Dec
StringTable.String: Encouraging people to come to Drengin worlds sounds like a delicious plan. Only apparently we're not supposed to eat these ones? This strange concept will supposedly make us money.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWondersoftheGalaxy_Name
StringTable.String: Wonders of the Galaxy

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWondersoftheGalaxy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build advanced tourism structures.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginWondersoftheGalaxy_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that the galaxy knows how great Drengin is, and how unlikely they are to have their faces eaten here, we're drawing more tourists than ever before. Who would have thought that not eating faces could be so worthwhile?

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHomageTech_Name
StringTable.String: Homage

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHomageTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build the Temple of Strength.

StringTable.Label: Haven_DenginHomageTech_Dec
